verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: The Father has a plan, though it’s hard to see it now

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: You feel you’re walking all alone, but He is there, no doubt

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: When the storm around you rages and you’re tossed to and fro

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines: When you’re faced with life’s decisions, not sure which way to go

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: Stand still and let God move

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: Standing still is hard to do

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: When you feel you have reached the end

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines: He’ll make a way for you

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
When the enemy surrounds you, and the walls are closing in
When the tide is swiftly rising and you wonder where He’s been?

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: Friend, there never was a moment that His arms weren’t reaching out

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines: You can rest assured and be secure God is moving right now

verse.name: o1
verse.lines: The answer will come, but only in His time
